data.prayer: Father, encourage the 3,120 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of East Sikkim, Sikkim, India

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of East Sikkim access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Please, convict the 3,120 believers in East Sikkim, Sikkim, India to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the county of East Sikkim to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Gangtok
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Gangtok, Sikkim, India.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of East Sikkim. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 283,600 people living in East Sikkim.

data.section_summary:
the county of East Sikkim, Sikkim, India has a population of 283,600.

We estimate East Sikkim has 3,120 people who might know Jesus, 3,441 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 277,039 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of East Sikkim.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.
